title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: The New Package Wizard in the Java development environment displays a confusing message when invoked.
OB: When I invoke the New Package Wizard in the Java development environment, I see a message at the top that says 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. The package name field is initially empty, and I find this message confusing.
EB: When I invoke the New Package Wizard in the Java development environment with an empty package name field, I expect to not see any error or warning messages initially.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Invoke the New Package Wizard.
